data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Although the language of the Greeks was classified as Indo-European, the Greeks borrowed the alphabet from the Phoenicians, who spread their culture throughout the Mediterranean area. The Greeks ____ the Phoenician ____ to ____ their ____, such ____ adding ____ vowels ____ changing ____ symbols. The Greek alphabet also included many additional signs to represent sounds not found in Phoenician.
data.partBlankContent: Although the language of the Greeks was classified as Indo-European, the Greeks borrowed the alphabet from the Phoenicians, who spread their culture throughout the Mediterranean area. The Greeks twe____ the Phoenician alph____ to su__ their lang____, such a_ adding mo__ vowels a__ changing so__ symbols. The Greek alphabet also included many additional signs to represent sounds not found in Phoenician.
data.answer: 虽然希腊人的语言被归类为印欧语系，但希腊人从腓尼基人那里借用了字母，腓尼基人把他们的文化传播到了整个地中海地区。希腊人调整了腓尼基字母以适应他们的语言，比如增加了更多的元音和改变了一些符号。希腊字母还包括许多额外的符号来表示腓尼基语中没有的声音。
